dict.acceptation: 像，像…一样；由于；同时，当…时；尽管；
阿斯（古罗马重量单位，约373克）；

sent.orig: The amount of soluble arsenic in Realgar was 0.62%, including 0.42% As and 0.18% As respectively.
sent.trans: 雄黄中可溶性砷百分含量为0.62%，其中As和As比例为2.30∶1。

sent.orig: As, Sb, Mo, W, Bi and Te etc. may act as indicator for industrial orebody.
sent.trans: As、Sb、Mo、W、Bi、Te等元素可作为工业矿体之标志性元素。

sent.orig: Run-as -- This button will execute the contents of the script box as Lua code.
sent.trans: as--这个按钮将会以LUA代码形式运行脚本框中的内容。

sent.orig: AS-2 thus obtained homogeneous as shown by Sepharose CL-4B column chromatography and cellulose acetate film electrophoresis.
sent.trans: AS-2经Sepharose CL-4B柱层析为单一对称峰，经醋酸纤维素膜电泳为一条带，冻融后高速离心无沉淀可证明其为均一级分。

sent.orig: Oxygen-alkali bleaching process of larch AS-AQ pulp was studied in the paper.
sent.trans: 对落叶松AS-AQ浆氧碱漂白工艺进行了研究。
